dsOverview.title: Global Oceanographic Data Set Atlas, climatologies, by Samuels and Cox GFDL

summary.p: Samuel and Cox (GFDL) took 15 commonly used data sets for ocean models and put them on a uniform 1x1 degree grid. Original data sources include Levitus, Hellerman, Esbensen and Kushnir to name just a few.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DOC/NOAA/GFDL > NOAA Geophysical Fluid Dynamics Laboratory, U.S. Department of Commerce

EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Precipitation > Precipitation Amount
